EmailTemplate.name: MTI Emails.MTI Email 2
EmailTemplate.subject: Let MBO interview you, get $50
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Associate}},
MBO Partners is looking for volunteers to be featured on our Meet The Independents <http://www.mbopartners.com/state-of-independence/meet-the-independents.html> site, representing {{company.State:default=your state}}. The site features consultant profiles that are shared with MBO's large online audience and distributed in monthly newsletters reaching more than 20,000 business professionals.
It's a great brand awareness opportunity for your business, and if you're selected, we will send you a $50 Amazon gift card as our way of saying thanks!
To learn more about marketing your business with MBO's network, reply to this email.
Thanks, and have a great day! ___________________________________ Jaime MacDonell Marketing Manager MBO Partners
t: 703-793-6368 e: jmacdonell@mbopartners.com w: www.mbopartners.com <http://www.mbopartners.com/>
